markdownRemark.html:
[I. Brief Summary]

  • This book was recommended by a professor at Feltre School. Being Logical: A Guide to Good Thinking by Dennis Q. McIner uncovers the importance of logical thinking. The book is short but I seemed to be dragging my feet to finsih it. I kept going because I wanted to understand the flip side of lofical thinking. What makes someone illogical?
